name: DanbyParcelGuard
0:
”Alexa, ask Danby Parcel Guard how many expected parcels for me.”
”Alexa, tell Danby Parcel Guard to unlock my mailbox.”
”Alexa, ask Danby Parcel Guard how many parcels i have received today.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: danby parcel guard
des:
Control more of your Danby Parcel Guard smart mailbox using the Danby parcel Guard skill by just asking Alexa. Enable the Danby Parcel Guard skill and you will be directed to link your Danby account with your Alexa account.
After connecting Alexa to your Danby account, you can say commands like:

Expected Parcels
"Alexa, ask danby parcel guard how many expected parcels for me."
"Alexa, ask danby parcel guard how many expected parcels for today"
"Alexa, ask danby parcel guard how many parcels expected to be delivered by tomorrow for frontmailbox(Device Name)"

Recent Parcels
"Alexa, ask danby parcel guard how many parcels i have received today."

Unlock Parcel Guard
"Alexa, tell danby parcel guard to unlock my mailbox."
